price: 12. Wuxuu baryaa Alle sokadi waxaan wax yeeli karin waxna u tari karin, Kaasi waa habowga fog.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
